channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Clanking drain, again., 10th March
item.description:
When the clanking drain was last fixed, it wasn't done properly, it continue to make a thunking noise. This was reported to the person in charge of overseeing the fix, yet ignored completely, without reply. As expected, over time, this problem has got worse and we're now back to loud clanking. Please can you fix it properly?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 162 London Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Deep and large pothole, 10th March
item.description:
This is in the middle of the road (Salisbury Ave) near the entrance to Canterbury Road. It could cause serious damage to any cars that hit it.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 149 Salisbury Avenue, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pedestrian lights out of order, 10th March
item.description:
The lights are not working. This is a well used crossing by many school children across a busy 3 lane main road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 418 Gloucester Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road Floods - Drains Blocked?, 10th March
item.description:
Hi, Harp Hill, immediately uphill of the junction with Greenway lane is floooding causing the road to become impassable for pedestrians and dangerous for cyclists. There are two drains in this location. Hopefully they are just blocked and you can jet them to resolve the problem for a while
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Turnpike House Greenway Lane, Charlton Kings
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large pothole in path., 10th March
item.description:
Large, deep pothole at the entrance to Cheltenham Ladies College Health and Fitness Centre. The pothole has been there for the last couple of months and is getting worse by the day.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 3 Malvern Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

Outside number 153 Salisbury Avenue

item.title: Possible Dangerous (Deep) Pothole, 10th March
item.description:
Next to bus stop outside library, needs urgent assessment as unable to stop and evaluate.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Churchdown Library Parton Road, Churchdown

item.title: Potholes in the entrance of our road, 10th March
item.description:
This is not a carriageway! The entrance into our estate has serveral pitholes that are getting dangerous especially if on a motorbike. The council have advised they have looked at the ‘carriageway’ so who knows where they were looking and deemed it safe. The road can’t even be considered level with the damage there is on this road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 4 West End Lane, Hucclecote
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 311 Old Bath Road, Cheltenham

item.title: More potholes, 9th March
item.description:
Two more potholes have reappeared here. They were recently filled in after many cars had burst tyres. Please come and repair asap.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 23 Odessa Park Gloucester Road, Tewkesbury

item.title: Road in poor condition, 9th March
item.description:
Reporting again, this is months old and still has not been sorted. Cars are swerving to avoid the crumbling road. Please sort
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 46 Leckhampton Road, Cheltenham

item.title: Shopping trolleys on top of sign post., 8th March
item.description:
There has been an upturned shopping trolley impaled on the sign post on the right of the road as you enter the coronation square car park for a number of weeks. Returned today and a second trolley has been impaled on the signpost as well.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 7 Amberley Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bushes growing into the road, 8th March
item.description:
Although most of the hedge on this lane leading from Winchcombe to Charlton Abbots has recently been flailed, there is a short section between the Belas Knap car park and Humblebee Cottages that still needs attention and has not been cut back for many years, especially in the area of the marker.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Corndean Lane, Winchcombe
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Streetlight has outside number 4 Little Grebe Road working/not working intermittently, 7th March
item.description:
As stated street light often failing. Sometimes working. Has been happening for several months. Council have been contacted but say it’s not their responsibility…
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 4 Little Grebe Road, Bishops Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Multiple potholes Everest Road, 7th March
item.description:
Old part of road, which was not resurfaced previously, is rapidly deteriorating.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 1a Everest Road, Cheltenham
